#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{int t,k,i,n,j,count;

    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {k=0;
              scanf("%d",&n);
              int a[n];
              for(i=0;i<n;i++)
              scanf("%d",&a[i]);
              count=n;
                 for(i=0;i<n;i++)
                 { k=0;
                                   for(j=0;j<n;j++)
                                   {
                                   if(a[j]!=((a[i]-i)+j))
                                    k++;                                  
                                   
                                   }
                                   if(k<count)
                                    count=k;
                                   }
                
                  
                   printf("%d \n",count);
                   }
                   return 0;
                   }
